lead_paragraph: A boys’ high school tennis team from California, Pa., forfeited four matches and lost its section title for using a girl to round out its squad.

headline.print_headline: Boys’ Team Penalized for Playing Girl
headline.main: High School Boys’ Tennis Team Is Penalized for Playing Girl

snippet: A boys’ high school tennis team from California, Pa., forfeited four matches and lost its section title for using a girl to round out its squad.
abstract: Boys tennis team at Pennsylvania's California Area High School forfeits four matches and loses its section title after using female player to round out squad; Western Pennsylvania Interscholastic Athletic League rules that team violated rule meant to keep schools from fielding mixed-gender teams if school provides teams for both sexes.
